metadata.title: CoViD-19: Meta-heuristic optimization based forecast method on time dependent bootstrapped data

abstract.original_text: A compounded method -exploiting the searching capabilities of an operation research algorithm and the power of bootstrap techniques -is presented. The resulting algorithm has been successfully tested to predict the turning point reached by the epidemic curve followed by the CoViD-19 virus in Italy. Futures lines of research, which include the generalization of the method to a broad set of distribution, will be finally given.

sentences.segment_text: A compounded method - exploiting the searching capabilities of an operation research algorithm and the power of bootstrap techniques - is presented .
The resulting algorithm has been successfully tested to predict the turning point reached by the epidemic curve followed by the CoViD-19 virus in Italy .
Futures lines of research , which include the generalization of the method to a broad set of distribution , will be finally given .
